SELECT count(*) FROM t_qc_standard q
AND q.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND q.memo LIKE CONCAT('%', #{memo}, '%')
AND q.is_deleted = #{isDeleted}
SELECT idx, name, type FROM t_qc_standard WHERE is_deleted = 'N' ORDER BY name

WITH material AS ( SELECT rm.idx, rm.type, rm.qc_type, rm.name, rm.expiry_date FROM t_raw_material rm WHERE rm.parents_idx is null ), product AS ( SELECT p.idx, p.name, p.code, p.spec, p.expiry_date, p.status, p.qc_type FROM t_product p WHERE is_deleted = 'N' ), base AS ( SELECT wt.idx, wt.trans_type, wt.code, wt.product_idx, p.name AS product_name, wt.material_idx, m.name as material_name, (CASE WHEN wt.status = '1' THEN m.qc_type WHEN wt.status = '5' THEN p.qc_type ELSE 'status not found' END) AS qc_type, wt.unit, wt.quantity, wt.status FROM t_warehouse_transaction wt LEFT JOIN material AS m ON m.idx = wt.material_idx LEFT JOIN product AS p ON p.idx = wt.product_idx ) SELECT idx, type, name, unit, target_value, min_value, max_value, memo FROM t_qc_standard qs WHERE is_deleted = 'N' AND EXISTS ( select 1 from base AS b, JSON_TABLE ( f_get_json_split_cte(b.qc_type, '|'), "$[*]" COLUMNS (value VARCHAR(255) PATH "$") ) jt WHERE b.idx = #{idx} AND jt.value = qs.type )
